title: Mini old judge and a gypsy queen.
author: BeanTown

posts.post_title: Mini old judge and a gypsy queen.
posts.post_content:
Two very scare 19th century cards.  Minis can rarely be found and when found complete without missing pieces is ultra rare, with a numeric grade.  Gypsy queens are almost equally hard to find and this one is of Pud Galvin.  I believe this is his only known pose of the three poses.  Please PM with offers.  Thanks

Update: Greer is no longer available.
JC-Three of the four Galvin poses are known as Gypsy Queens. Check your past emails; I believe I have sent you scans.
